summary: The diff partially implements the BuildRequest. Backend access control initialization (REQ-1) is partially addressed via migration.mo but lacks the specific principals/email. Frontend hero text styling (REQ-2) and solid menu backgrounds (REQ-3) are implemented. REQ-4 (admin dashboard review/enhancement) has no clear evidence of implementation beyond existing code references.

missing_requirements.requirement: Initialize backend access control with two Owner Admin principals (e6nnr-cosry-qkhze-ku7xv-mkip5-7r7jv-vzev3-rtopc-4na67-4flnw-oqe and jghzz-cnbjn-dw57n-z26cp-muyrx-mwdbf-xr3i7-y73da-5qlgr-kxe4h-4qe) and email anc.electronics.n.more@gmail.com
missing_requirements.reason: The migration.mo file creates an empty ownerAdmins list without hardcoding the two specific principals or email. There is no evidence in backend/main.mo diff showing these principals being initialized.

missing_requirements.requirement: Review existing admin dashboard code and add any vital missing functionality to improve admin operations
missing_requirements.reason: No new admin functionality is visible in the diff. The diff shows existing references to admin features but no new implementations or enhancements beyond what already existed.
